messages.message:
Hi All,
The default license for internal sandboxes expired on Dec 30, 2024. A new license has been generated and all active sandboxes have been updated to use the new license.
If you have a hibernated sandbox, on revival, you will likely have to update the license to continue using it.
To update license, ping @William Helmrath or me or anyone with admin permission to ICC to update the license.

Steps for installing the license (if you have proper permissions):
1. Download license from https://start.1password.com/open/i?a=VAAEGM2JPRH27E45XRQMXG5UKA&v=qbm6ysedz5bm7bzfvh3e[…]i=rcughm6mocokrnuoxy5yfvtvju&h=team-instabase.1password.com (https://start.1password.com/open/i?a=VAAEGM2JPRH27E45XRQMXG5UKA&v=qbm6ysedz5bm7bzfvh3ezf33be&i=rcughm6mocokrnuoxy5yfvtvju&h=team-instabase.1password.com)
2. Go to Cloud Console https://sandbox.console.instabase.com/sandbox and locate your sandbox
3. In sandbox page, go to Licenses tab.
4. Click “Add new license”
5. Upload license file
6. Click “Install”, page should update to show the installed license
7. Click three dots in top-right corner of license -> Manage
8. Enable switch “Apply license site-wide”
Thanks Anil/William. The list of people who can do this in ICC - is that a special role in ICC? Asking so that i can be included and also expand further on the team
Hi team, are licences managed somewhere centrally? is there a way to get reminder for expiry in a dedicated slack channel?

this is permanently fixed for internal sandboxes
prod licenses are managed by csms and not affected
